name: SingletonMap_putAllTest
description: Tests for the putAll method of the SingletonMap class.

test_cases.name: testPutAllWithEmptyMap
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with an empty map, ensuring the SingletonMap remains unchanged.

test_cases.name: testPutAllWithSingleEntryMap
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with a map containing a single entry, ensuring the SingletonMap updates the value.

test_cases.name: testPutAllWithMultipleEntriesMap
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method with a map containing multiple entries, ensuring an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
